<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
<B>
	PART
	8
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
<U>
	INTELLECTUAL
	PROPERTY
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Ownership.
</B>
	All Developments will be the exclusive property of the Company and the Company will have sole discretion to deal with Developments.
	For greater certainty, all work done during the Employment Period by the Employee for the Company or its affiliates is a work
	for hire of which the Company or its affiliate, as the case may be, is the first author for copyright purposes and in respect
	of which all copyright will vest in the Company or the relevant affiliate, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Records.
</B>
	The Employee will keep complete, accurate and authentic notes, reference materials, data and records of all Developments in
	the manner and form requested by the Company. All these materials will be Confidential Information upon their creation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
	8.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Moral
	Rights.
</B>
	The Employee hereby irrevocably waives all moral rights arising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	under
	statute in any jurisdiction or under common law which the employee may have now or in the future with respect to the Developments,
	including, without limitation, any rights the Employee may have to have the Employee&rsquo;s name associated with the Developments
	or to have the Employee&rsquo;s name not associated with the Developments, any rights the Employee may have to prevent the alteration,
	translation or destruction of the Developments, and any rights the Employee may have to control the use of the Developments in
	association with any product, service, cause or institution. The Employee agrees that this waiver may be invoked by the Company,
	and by any of its authorized agents or assignees, in respect of any or all of the Developments and that the Company may assign
	the benefit of this waiver to any Person.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Further
	Assurances.
</B>
	The Employee will do all further things that may be reasonably necessary or desirable in order to give full effect
	to the foregoing. If the Employee&rsquo;s co-operation is required in order for the Company to obtain or enforce legal protection
	of the Developments following the termination of the Employee&rsquo;s employment, the Employee will provide that co-operation
	so long as the Company pays to the Employee reasonable compensation for the Employee&rsquo;s time at a rate to be agreed, provided
	that the rate will not be less than the last base salary or compensation rate paid to the Employee by the Company during the Employee&rsquo;s
	employment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Obligations
	Continue.
</B>
	The Employee&rsquo;s obligations under this Part 8 are to
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
	remain in effect
	in perpetuity.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15PT">
<B>
	PART
	9
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
<U>
	CONSENT
	TO ENFORCEMENT
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The
	Employee confirms that all restrictions in Part 7 and 8 are reasonable and valid, and all defenses to the strict enforcement thereof
	by the Company are waived by the Employee. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, the Employee hereby consents to an
	injunction being granted by a court of competent jurisdiction in the event that the Employee is in any breach of any of the provisions
	stipulated in Part 7 and 8. The Employee hereby expressly acknowledges and agrees that injunctive relief is an appropriate and
	fair remedy in the event of a breach of any of the said provisions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.15PT">
<B>
	PART
	10
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
<U>
	WARRANTIES,
	COVENANTS AND REMEDIES
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
	10.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	obligations of the Employee as set forth in Parts 6 through 9 will be deemed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	to
	have commenced as of the date on which the Employee was first employed by Company. The Employee warrants that the Employee has
	not, to date, breached any of the obligations set forth in any of those Sections. Any breach or threatened breach of those sections
	by the Employee will constitute Just Cause for immediate termination of the Employee&rsquo;s employment or engagement by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	10.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Employee understands that the Company has expended significant financial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	resources
	in developing its products and the Confidential Information. Accordingly, a breach or threatened breach by the Employee of any
	of Parts 6 through 9 could result in unfair competition with the Company and could result in the Company and its shareholders
	suffering irreparable harm that is not capable of being calculated and that cannot be fully or adequately compensated by the recovery
	of damages alone. Accordingly, the Employee agrees that the Company will be entitled to interim and permanent injunctive relief,
	specific performance and other equitable remedies, in addition to any other relief to which the Company may become entitled.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	10.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Employee&rsquo;s obligations under each of Parts 6 through 9 are to remain in effect in accordance with each of their terms and
	will exist and continue in full force and effect despite any breach or repudiation of this Agreement or the Employee&rsquo;s employment
	(including, without limitation, the Employee&rsquo;s wrongful dismissal) by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.2PT">
<B>
	PART
	11
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
<B>
<U>
	TERMINATION
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.1PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	11.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Termination
	by the Employee.
</B>
	The Employee may terminate this Agreement upon 60 Business Days prior written notice given by the Employee
	to the Company. The Company, at its sole discretion, may elect to accept the 60 Business Days written notice or to reduce or eliminate
	the notice period. In such event, the Employee&rsquo;s employment shall terminate on the earlier day elected by the Company. Such
	election on the part of the Company will not alter the nature of the termination as voluntary and the Company will not be required
	to pay any severance or termination payments in respect of a termination by the Employee under this Section 11.1. Upon the termination
	of employment by the Employee under this Section 11.1 the Company shall pay to the Employee all bonuses and other benefits earned
	or accrued up to the date of termination, but otherwise all obligations of the Company under this Agreement shall end.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Definition
	of &ldquo;Just Cause&rdquo;.
</B>
	&ldquo;Just Cause&rdquo; means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(i)
	Employee&rsquo;s conviction of, or plea of nolo contendere, to any felony or to a crime involving moral depravity or fraud; (ii)
	Employee&rsquo;s commission of an act of dishonesty or fraud or breach of fiduciary duty or act that has a material adverse effect
	on the name or public image of the Company, as determined by the Board provided the Board affords the Employee the opportunity
	to personally appear before the Board in order to state his case prior to the Board voting to so
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	terminate
	the Employee; (iii) Employee&rsquo;s commission of an act of willful misconduct or gross negligence, as determined by the Board
	provided the Employee shall have the opportunity to state his case before the Board prior to the Board taking such decision to
	so terminate the Employee; (iv) the failure of Employee to perform his duties under this Agreement; (v) the material breach of
	any of Employee&rsquo;s material obligations under this Agreement; (vi) the failure of Employee to follow a directive of the Executive
	Chairman or the Board; or (vii) excessive absenteeism, chronic alcoholism or any other form of addiction that prevents Employee
	from performing the essential functions of his position with or without a reasonable accommodation; provided, however, that the
	Company may terminate Employee&rsquo;s employment for Just Cause, as to (iv) or (v) above, only after failure by Employee to correct
	or cure, or to commence or to continue to pursue the correction or curing of, such conduct or omission within ten (10) days after
	receipt by Employee of written notice by the Company of each specific claim of any such misconduct or failure.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 10 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	Page
</I>
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
<I>
<B>
	10
</B>
</I>
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
<I>
	of
<B>
	15
</B>
</I>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

</TABLE>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Termination
	by the Company for Just Cause.
</B>
	The Company may terminate this Agreement at any time for Just Cause without notice and (except
	as provided in the immediately following sentence) without payment of any compensation by way of anticipated earnings, damages,
	or other relief of any kind whatsoever. Upon the termination of employment by the Company for Just Cause, the Company shall pay
	to the Employee all salaries, bonuses, vacation and other benefits, if any, earned or accrued up to the date of termination, but
	otherwise all obligations of the Company under this Agreement end.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Termination
	by the Company for Other Than Just Cause.
</B>
	The Company
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	may terminate this Agreement at
	any time for other than Just Cause upon the following terms:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	if
	the Company so terminates this Agreement at any time during the Initial Term of this
	Agreement, the Company shall pay to the Employee an amount equal to the base salary then
	payable, if any, for the longer of (a) the period from the date of such termination to
	the end of the Initial Term as if the Agreement had not been so terminated or (b) twelve
	months, and in all cases, subject to the deductions in Section 3.9;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	if
	the Company so terminates this Agreement after the Initial Term or during a Renewal Term,
	the Company shall pay the Employee an amount equal to the base salary, if any, then payable
	to the Employee for a period of twelve months as if the Agreement had not been so terminated
	or had been renewed, subject
<B>
	to
</B>
	the deductions in Section 3.9; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	upon
	any such termination, all bonuses or other benefits earned or accrued up to the date
	of termination or expiry shall be paid by the Company, but except for such payments and
	the payments to be made pursuant to Sections 11.4(a) or (b), as applicable, all obligations
	of the Company under this Agreement shall end upon such termination or failure to renew.
	Payments under Sections 11.4(a) or (b) shall be payable monthly subject to deductions
	in Section 3.9.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 11 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage82"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.5PT">
	11.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Termination
	by the Employee for Good Reason.
</B>
	The Employee may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	terminate
	this Agreement at any time upon the occurrence of any of the following events (each a
<B>
	&ldquo;Good Reason&rdquo;),
</B>
	if such
	occurrence takes place without the express written consent of the Employee:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	a
	change in the Employee&rsquo;s title or position or a material diminution in the Employee&rsquo;s
	duties or the assignment to the Employee of duties which materially impairs the Employee&rsquo;s
	ability to function in his current capacity for the Company, or, with respect to an assignment
	of duties only, is materially inconsistent with his duties; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	any
	material change in the Employee&rsquo;s direct reporting obligations.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In
	the event that the Employee terminates this Agreement for Good Reason, he shall be entitled to the same payments and benefits
	as provided in Section 11.4 of this Agreement as if the Company had terminated this Agreement at the time that the Employee terminates
	this Agreement under this Section 11.5.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Full
	and Final Release.
</B>
	In order to be eligible for the payments as set forth in this Section 11 the Employee must (i) execute
	and deliver to the Company a general release, in a form satisfactory to the Company and Employee, and (ii) be and remain in full
	compliance with his obligations under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2PT">
	11.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Fair
	and Reasonable.
</B>
	The parties confirm that the provisions contained in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Sections
	11.4 and 11.5 are fair and reasonable and that all such payments shall be in full satisfaction of all claims which the Employee
	may otherwise have at law against the Company including, or in equity by virtue of such termination of employment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Return
	of Property.
</B>
	Upon the termination of the Employee&rsquo;s employment for any reason whatsoever, the Employee shall at once
	deliver or cause to be delivered to the Company all books, documents, effects, money, computer equipment, computer storage media,
	securities or other property belonging to the Company or for which the Company is liable to others, which are in the possession,
	charge, control or custody of the Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.2PT">
	11.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Provisions
	Which Operate Following Termination.
</B>
	Notwithstanding any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	termination
	of this Agreement for any reason whatsoever, provisions of this Agreement necessary to give efficacy thereto shall continue in
	full force and effect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.10
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.55PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Board.
</B>
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, the termination of Employee&rsquo;s
</FONT>
	employment hereunder for any reason shall automatically
	be deemed as Employee&rsquo;s resignation from the Board of Directors of the Company and any affiliates without any further action,
	except when the Board shall, in writing, request a continuation of duty as a Director in its sole discretion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 12 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.1PT">
<B>
	PART
	12
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.35PT">
<B>
<U>
	GENERAL
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: 0.35PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Benefit
	&amp; Binding.
</B>
	This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of and be binding
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	upon the
	respective successors and permitted assigns of the parties hereto.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Amendments
	&amp; Waivers.
</B>
	No amendment to this Agreement shall be valid or binding unless set forth in writing and duly executed by all
	of the parties hereto. No waiver of any breach of any provision of this Agreement shall be effective or binding unless made in
	writing and signed by the party purporting to give the same and, unless otherwise provided in the written waiver, shall be limited
	to the specific breach waived.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Time.
</B>
	Time shall be of the essence of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Assignment.
</B>
	Neither this Agreement nor the rights and obligations hereunder
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	shall be assignable
	by either party without the consent of the other.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; LETTER-SPACING: -0.05PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Severability.
</B>
	If any provision of this Agreement is determined to be invalid or unenforceable in whole or in part, such invalidity or unenforceability
	shall attach only to such provision and all other provisions hereof shall continue in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Attornment.
</B>
	For the purposes of all legal proceedings this Agreement shall be deemed to have been performed in the State of Texas and
	the courts of Dallas County shall have jurisdiction to entertain any action arising under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD COLSPAN="2">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

	10.1.(4)

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	THIS AGREEMENT
</B>
	is
	made as of June 16, 2015
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	B E T W E E N:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	ZION OIL AND GAS INC.,
</B>
	a Company incorporated under the laws of Delaware.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(the
<B>
	&ldquo;Company&rdquo;
</B>
	)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	and -
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	GLEN H. PERRY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(the
<B>
	&ldquo;Employee&rdquo;
</B>
	)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	CONTEXT OF THIS AGREEMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company
	explores for oil and gas in Israel.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Employee has
	been serving as independent petroleum engineering consultant under the direction and control of the Company&rsquo;s President since
	October 15, 2012.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company
	wishes to employ the Employee as the President and Chief Operating Officer upon the terms and conditions as set out herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	FOR VALUE RECEIVED,
</B>
	the sufficiency of which is acknowledged, the parties agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	PART 1
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	INTERPRETATION
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Definitions.
</B>
	In this Agreement, the following terms shall have the following meanings:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;
</B>
	means
	this agreement and all schedules attached hereto and all amendments made hereto and thereto in writing by the parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN">
<B>
	&ldquo;Business Day&rdquo;
</B>
	means a day other than
	a Friday, Saturday or statutory holiday in the U.S.A. and Israel.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage87"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Person&rdquo;
</B>
	includes
	individuals, companies, limited partnerships, general partnerships, joint stock companies, joint ventures, associations, companies,
	trusts or other organizations, whether or not legal entities.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Fringe Benefits&rdquo;
</B>
	shall mean the vehicle, cell phone and insurance benefits to be provided to Employee in accordance with paragraphs 3.3, 3.4
	and 3.10 herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Fringe Benefits Tax&rdquo;
</B>
	shall mean any tax incurred by or attributable to Employee as a result of the Fringe Benefits.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Entire
	Agreement.
</B>
	This Agreement together with the agreements and other documents to be delivered pursuant to this Agreement (or other
	agreements pertaining to employee benefits, including, without limitation, stock option and bonus plan agreements), constitute
	the entire agreement between the parties pertaining to the subject matter of this Agreement and supersede all prior agreements,
	understandings, negotiations and discussions, whether oral or written, of the parties and there are no warranties, representations
	or other agreements between the parties in connection with the subject matter of this Agreement except as specifically set forth
	in this Agreement and any document delivered pursuant to this Agreement. No supplement, modification or waiver or termination of
	this Agreement shall be binding unless executed in writing by the party to be bound thereby.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Sections
	and Headings.
</B>
	The division of this Agreement into parts and sections and the insertion of headings are for convenience of reference
	only and shall not affect the construction or interpretation of this Agreement. The terms &ldquo;this Agreement&rdquo;, &ldquo;hereof&rdquo;,
	&ldquo;hereunder&rdquo; and similar expressions refer to this Agreement and not to any particular article, section or other portion
	hereof and include any agreement or instrument supplemental or ancillary hereto. Unless something in the subject matter or context
	is inconsistent therewith, references herein to parts and sections are to parts and sections of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Number
	&amp; Gender.
</B>
	Words importing the singular number only shall include the plural and vice versa and words importing the masculine
	gender shall include the feminine and neuter genders and vice versa.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Applicable
	Law.
</B>
	This Agreement shall be construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, and specifically,
	those of the State of Texas applicable thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Currency.
</B>
	Unless otherwise specified, all references herein to currency shall be references to currency of the the State of Israel (NIS)
	with the relative equivalency to the U.S. dollar to be reviewed every six (6) months and adjusted accordingly if necessary.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Calculation
	of Time.
</B>
	When calculating the period of time within which or following which any act is to be done or step taken pursuant to
	this Agreement, the date which is the reference date in calculating such period shall be excluded. If the last day of such period
	is a non Business Day, the period in question shall end on the next Business Day.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage88"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	PART 2
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	APPOINTMENT AND DUTIES
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Appointment.
</B>
	The Company agrees to employ the Employee as the President and Chief Operating Officer upon the terms and conditions contained
	herein, and the Employee accepts such appointments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Term.
</B>
	The
	employment of the Employee hereunder shall commence effective July
<B>
	1,
</B>
	2015 and shall continue for an initial term until
	December 31, 2016 (the &ldquo;Initial Term&rdquo;) unless terminated in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement. This
	Agreement shall be automatically renewed for successive one (1) year terms (each a &ldquo;Renewal Term&rdquo;) unless the Company
	or Employee indicates in writing, more than 30 days prior to the termination of this Initial term or any Renewal term, that it
	does not intend to renew this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Duties
	and Reporting.
</B>
	The Employee will report directly to the Chief Executive Officer of the Company and shall carry out all duties
	and responsibilities which are from time to time assigned to him by the Board and/or the Chief Executive Officer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	PART 3
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	BENEFITS &amp; EXPENSES
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Gross
	Salary.
</B>
	During the term hereof, and subject to the performance of the services required to be performed hereunder by Employee,
	the Company shall pay to the Employee for all services rendered hereunder, $250,000 as base salary, payable not less often than
	once per month and in accordance with the Company&rsquo;s normal and reasonable payroll practices, a monthly gross amount in NIS
	equal to $20,833 (the &ldquo;Gross Salary&rdquo;). The exchange rate to be used for the monthly salary calculation, to be paid
	in NIS, will be any Shekel representative rate used internally for total employees in the range of dates between the 25
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	and 30
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	of each month. The Board of Directors will review the Gross Salary annually and, in its sole discretion, consider
	any increases it deems warranted at that time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Other Compensation.
</B>
	The Employee shall be granted a fully vested option to purchase up to 100,000 shares of common stock of the Company at a per
	share exercise price of $0.01. Such option shall be issued to Employee within ten (10) days from the signature hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Vehicle.
</B>
	Company shall provide Employee with use of a vehicle, and the Company shall pay for registration, reasonable gas expenses,
	maintenance and insurance or in the alternative, pay Employee a gross amount monthly equal to the reasonable expense of leasing
	a vehicle and providing fuel for same.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Cell Phone.
</B>
	Company shall provide the Employee with a cell phone and pay the service provider directly for its maintenance and reasonable
	use charges.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Benefits.
</B>
	(i) The Employee shall be entitled to fully participate in all of the Company&rsquo;s benefit plans generally available to
	its senior level employees from time to time, including any profit sharing plan, royalty pool, management incentive plan or similar
	plan or arrangement; provided, however, nothing herein will be construed to limit, condition or otherwise encumber
</FONT>
	the Company&rsquo;s
	right to amend, discontinue, substitute or maintain any employee benefits plan, program or perquisite in accordance with applicable
	law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage89"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding
	any other provision in this Agreement to the contrary, this Section 3.5 and the rights conferred on Employee herein shall survive
	the termination or expiration of this Agreement. In addition, in accordance with Israeli law:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	the event of termination of employment for any reason, Employee shall be entitled to redemption of annual leave soley in accordance
	with and subject to the provisions of the Annual Leave Law of 1951.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sick
	Leave. Employee shall be entitled to sick leave in accordance with the provisions of the Sickness Pay Law-1976.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Recreation
	Pay. Employee shall be entitled to annual recreation pay (Dmey Havra&rsquo;a) in an amount to be determined in accoraance with
	Israeli regulations as in effect from time to time with respect to such pay.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bituach
	Menahalim. The Company and Employee will obtain and maintain Manager&rsquo;s Insurance (Bituach Mehahalim) under Israeli law for
	the benefit of Employee in the customary form in Israel. Each of the Company and Employee shall contribute toward the premiums
	payable with respect to such insurance those amounts which would be recognized under applicable Israeli law, but in no event shall
	such contributed amounts be more than fourteen and one-third percent (14 1/3%) of each monthly Gross Salary payment from the Company
	and six percent (6%) of such amount from Employee. It is hereby agreed that in the event Employee&rsquo;s employment hereunder
	is terminated by the Company for any reason other than &ldquo;cause,&rdquo; the amount payable under such insurance policy with
	respect to severance pay shall be in lieu and final substitution of the amount of severance pay, if any, payable under Israeli
	law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Keren
	Heshtamlut. The Company and Employee shall maintain an advancement fund under Israeli law (Keren Heshtamlut) for the exclusive
	benefit of Employee. The Company shall contribute to such fund an amount equal to seven and one-half percent (7 %%) of each monthly
	Gross Salary payment, and Employee shall contribute to such fund an amount equal to two and one-half percent (2 %%) of each monthly
	Gross Salary payment. Employee hereby instructs the Company to transfer to such advancement fund the amount of Employee&rsquo;s
	and the Company&rsquo;s contribution from each monthly Gross Salary payment. Employee can elect to receive any part of the employer
	contribution in cash should this be more efficient for tax purposes at Employee&rsquo;s election. Any cost whatsoever associated
	with receipt by Employee of the employer contribution in cash will be borne solely by Employee (tax or otherwise). On termination
	of employment, Employee will be eligible to receive all amounts accrued to him in the fund.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage90"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Expenses.
</B>
	The Employee shall be reimbursed for ordinary, necessary and reasonable out-of-pocket trade or business expenses incurred
	in connection with the performance of Employee&rsquo;s duties under this Agreement, together with any applicable sales and goods
	and services taxes, by the Company within fifteen (15) Business Days after presentation by the
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Employee
	of proper invoices and receipts in keeping with the policies of the Company, as established from time to time, subject to the
	reasonable approval of the Chief Executive Officer or the Board of Directors. The Company also authorizes business class travel
	when flying on overseas flights. The Company can also authorize a corporate credit card (USA card and an Israeli card) for Company
	usage purposes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Options.
</B>
	Subject to the Employee entering into the Company&rsquo;s standard Employee Stock Option agreement, for services required to
	be performed hereunder by Employee, the Employee shall be entitled to participate in an employee stock option plan of the Company.
	Company shall grant to Employee under the Company&rsquo;s 2011 Stock Option Plans fully vested options to purchase 25,000 shares
	of Common Stock of the Company during the Initial Term at a per share exercise price of $0.01 (&ldquo;Vested Options&rdquo;) commencing
	January 5, 2016, and continuing on fifth (5th) day of January of each successive Renewal Term. In the event that this Agreement
	continues after the Initial Term, the Company annually shall grant to the Employee additional stock options which in no event shall
	be less than the per term amount granted herein with such other terms to be agreed upon by the parties. All Options are subject
	to the terms of the written stock option agreement(s) issued by the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Paid Time
	Off/Paid Holidays.
</B>
	The Employee shall be entitled to paid time off (&ldquo;PTO&rdquo;) at the rate of twenty (20) days for
	each calendar year, pro-rated as applicable for any partial calendar year and subject to the terms of the Company&rsquo;s vacation
	policy. PTO is meant to include all vacation and personal days, and Employee shall be compensated at the usual rate of base compensation
	for any PTO. Employee shall not be entitled to any additional PTO. The Employee shall also be entitled to paid Company Holidays
	as generally given and recognized for the State of Israel. Vacation days may be accumulated for two (2) years, after which they
	must be used or redeemed; provided that accumulation of vacation days in excess of forty (40) days may be approved by the Board
	of Directors in its discretion. Vacation days shall be prorated for any portion of a year to the date of termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Withholding
	Tax.
</B>
	Company shall withhold, or charge Employee with, all taxes and other compulsory payments as required under Israeli law
	with respect to all payments, benefits and/or other compensation paid to Employee in connection with his employment with Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Insurance.
</B>
	The
	Employee shall be entitled to participate in the Company&rsquo;s health insurance program and the Company shall reimburse Employee
	for any health insurance costs. The monthly premiums attributed to Employee&rsquo;s current health insurance coverage with Blue
	Cross Blue Shield shall be paid directly to Blue Cross Blue Shield on behalf of Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Executive Assistant.
</B>
	The Company agrees that the role of President and Chief Operating Officer may require a dedicated executive assistant and upon
	request, will provide such person, whether full-time or part-time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Professional Fees.
</B>
	The Company shall pay for or reimburse Employee for all professional petroleum engineer license fees and taxes incurred to
	maintain Employee&rsquo;s status as a licensed petroleum engineer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage91"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	6
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Computer.
</B>
	The Company shall purchase a laptop computer for Employee&rsquo;s use when required by Employee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	3.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Fringe
	Benefits Tax.
</B>
	All fringe benefits taxes attributable to or owed by Employee related to fringe benefits shall be borne or paid
	by the Company
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	PART 4
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	EMPLOYEE&rsquo;S COVENANTS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Service.
</B>
	The Employee shall devote substantially all of his business time, attention and ability to the business of the Company and
	shall well and faithfully serve the Company and shall use his best efforts to promote the interests of the Company. The Employee
	appreciates that the Employee&rsquo;s duties may involve significant travel from the Employee&rsquo;s place of employment, and
	the Employee agrees to travel as reasonably required in order to fulfill the Employee&rsquo;s duties. The Employee may sit on boards
	of other companies unless there is a reasonable basis upon which the Company may deny him the right to do so. In addition, the
	Company acknowledges and permits Employee&rsquo;s position with and lecture responsibilities at Technion and, with the prior approval
	of the Company, other potential energy industry commitments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Duties
	and Responsibilities.
</B>
	The Employee shall duly and diligently perform all the duties assigned to him while in the employment
	of the Company, and shall truly and faithfully account for and deliver to the Company all money, securities and things of value
	belonging to the Company which the Employee may from time to time receive for, from or on account of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	4.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Rules and
	Regulations.
</B>
	The Employee shall be bound by and shall faithfully observe and abide by all the rules and regulations of the
	Company from time to time in force which are brought to his notice including insider trading policies and underwriter lock ups,
	from time to time in force which are brought to his notice.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	PART 5
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION AND DEVELOPMENTS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	5.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	&ldquo;Confidential
	Information&rdquo;
</B>
	means information, whether or not originated by the Employee, that relates to the business or affairs of
	the Company, its affiliates, clients or suppliers and is confidential or proprietary to, about or created by the Company, its affiliates,
	clients, or suppliers. Confidential Information includes, but is not limited to, the following types of confidential information
	and other proprietary information of a similar nature (whether or not reduced to writing or designated or marked as confidential):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	work product resulting from or related to work or projects performed
	for or to be performed for the Company or its affiliates, including but not limited to, the interim and final lines of inquiry,
	hypotheses, research and conclusions related thereto and the methods, processes, procedures, analysis, techniques and audits used
	in connection therewith;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 6; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage92"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">

</TD>

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.05PT">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	computer software of any type or form and in any stage of actual or anticipated development, including
	but not limited to, programs and program modules, routines and subroutines, procedures, algorithms, design concepts, design specifications
	(design notes, annotations, documentation, flowcharts, coding sheets, and the like), source code, object code and load modules,
	programming, program patches and system designs;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.05PT">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	information relating to developments (as hereinafter defined) prior to any public disclosure thereof,
	including but not limited to, the nature of the developments, production data, technical and engineering data, test data and test
	results, the status and details of research and development of products and services, and information regarding acquiring, protecting,
	enforcing and licensing proprietary rights (including patents, copyrights and trade secrets);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.05PT">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	internal Company personnel and financial information, vendor names and other vendor information,
	purchasing and internal cost information, internal services and operational manuals, and the manner and method of conducting the
	Company&rsquo;s business;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.05PT">
	(v)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	marketing and development plans, price and cost data, price and fee amounts, pricing and billing
	policies, quoting procedures, marketing techniques and methods of obtaining business, forecasts and forecast assumptions and volumes,
	and future plans and potential strategies of the Company that have been or are being discussed; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="LETTER-SPACING: 0.05PT">
	(vi)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all information that becomes known to the Employee as a result of employment that the Employee,
	acting reasonably, believes is confidential information or that the Company takes measures to protect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	5.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Confidential
	Information does not include:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the general skills and experience gained during the Employee&rsquo;s employment or engagement with
	the Company that the Employee could reasonably have been expected to acquire in similar employment or engagements with other companies;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	information publicly known without breach of this Agreement or similar agreements; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	information, the disclosure of which is required to be made by any law, regulation, governmental
	authority or court (to the extent of the requirement), provided that before disclosure is made, notice of the requirement is provided
	to the Company, and to the extent of the requirement, (to the extent reasonably possible in the circumstances) the Company is afforded
	an opportunity to dispute the requirement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage93"></A>
